abstract.t: [I-D.ietf-l2vpn-evpn] describes a solution of carrying multicast traffic using replication ingress and inclusive trees (P2MP LSPs). It does not provide the usage of selective trees for carrying multicast traffic. This document provides protocols and procedures by which a selective tree can be used to carry traffic belonging only to a specified set of IP multicast streams from one or more EVPN instances.
